heading: Tonight
text: Mixed clouds. Chance of an evening snow shower northeast. Much colder. Lows from -5 to 5, with lower temperatures in the north. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph, diminishing overnight.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly sunny, and cold, with highs in the single digits to near 10 in the north, mid teens to lower 20s in the south. North wind 5 to 15 mph, diminishing in the afternoon.

heading: Friday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy, with a chance of snow showers developing south and west of I-89. Lows in the single digits north, increasing into the teens south. Light wind.
